review: Great product. Easy to install. Everything you need is in the box. Works great.
author: EYE_1

review: Fire Stick is an inexpensive way of making your tv a smart tv. There is so much it can do that I haven't even tried yet. I love it!!
author: Janis Collis "jancollins4"

review: It's really nice to have works same as apple TV just 60$ cheaper
author: Debbie

review: So far very impressed.  Bought a second one. This blows my Chromecast out of the water.
author: Jeff Gottlieb

review: Sadly I was disappointed.  After an hour of watching it,  it starts echoing the sound and it makes it impossible to watch,  then you have to get up,  unplug then plug it back in for it to fix itself,  then an hour later it's right back to that echoing sound.
author: F.saindon

review: Easy to use. Straight forward navigation and quick installation. I was more than impressed with this product. Great price as well.
author: Brian F "TromaFreak64"

review: Works great, simple install.  Much faster access to Netflix than any of my older web enabled devices.
author: Robert Sudduth

review: In love with it so far! Easy to use and navigate!
author: Amazon Customer
